description:
SkyORB is more than a simple star map, it's a collection of 6 tools including a 3D star map, 3D planetarium, ephemeris, search engine, sun clock and more.

GET INSTRUCTIONS, VIDEOS, FACEBOOK COMMUNITY USERS AT http://www.realtech-vr.com/skyorb/

SkyORB features a 3D interface, with OpenGL ES 2.0 support, a search engine, a large catalog of stars (Hyparcos), deep objects (NGC/IC 2000) planets, current satellite (including current space shuttle missions) (MPC) and let you choose see the actual sky from any point on Earth.

SkyORB allows you to fine tune your observation location (and orientation with digital compass if available) with automatic detection from GPS (or entering the longitude, latitude and altitude). Information like sunset and sunrise are computed as well as moonrise and moonset and full / new moon dates.

The sky map is drawn with realtime precession. You can rotate freely and in realtime in 360 degrees at 60 frames per second. Moon and other planets are rendered in real 3D objects with different level of details using state of the art 3D effects for webOS

This program offers:
• A 3D planetarium with photorealistic rendering,
• Sophisticated OpenGL ES 2.0 support
• A sky view with realtime precessing,
• Moon phases,
• Epheremis (day/night rise times)
• Weather from current location.
• Universal search engine, 
• MPC updater (comets, satellites, launch mission, ISS).
• GPS or user location,
• Compass support,
• Star finder: Point the device and reveal the star or planet.
• Optimized for phones and tablets.

Check out our Facebook page: 
http://www.facebook.com/pages/SkyORB/120203608017193

Check out our Twitter page: 
http://www.twitter.com/realtech_VR
versionNote: Addresses an issue with webOS 2.0 devices preventing the application to launch.
